name: Papa Noel Llamada
description:
Do you want Santa Claus to make a call to your iPhone ot iPad? On top of being able to call it?
Imagine the face of surprise, when I call you from Lapland and ask about your life and what gifts you want.
Deliver illusion this Christmas and have one of the most beautiful memories of childhood. You will see the eyes of the little ones shine while they open their mouths stunned

You can find out what gifts to make this Christmas and get it right!


Features:

• Simulate the fake Incoming call from santa claus.
• Santa claus sounds.
• Phone Ringtone.
• Great as a game.
• Easy to use.
• Options to decline, or, accept call.
• NO need for Wi-Fi to play for more fun.


Enjoy with your friends!

Thank you for playing with us leave us your feedback and we will try to make our game even better and more interesting!
